00017 void Renderable::render()
00018 {
00019     list<SceneNode*>::const_iterator iter;
00020     for (iter = users.begin(); iter != users.end(); ++iter)
00021     {
00022         SceneNode* parent = (*iter);
00023         if (parent->isVisible())
00024         {
00025             double radius = sqrt((getWidth() * getWidth()) + (getHeight() * getHeight()));
00026             if (Utils::get()->onScreen(parent->getWorldPosition(), parent->getWorldScale() * radius))
00027             {
00028                 Camera* cam = SceneManager::get()->getCamera();
00029                 hgeVector screenPosition = cam->convertToScreenSpace(parent->getWorldPosition());
00030                 render(parent, screenPosition, cam);
00031             }
00032         }
00033     }
00034 }
00035 
00036 void Renderable::render(RenderTexture* const tex)
00037 {
00038     list<SceneNode*>::const_iterator iter;
00039     for (iter = users.begin(); iter != users.end(); ++iter)
00040     {
00041         SceneNode* parent = (*iter);
00042         if (parent->isVisible())
00043         {
00044             double radius = sqrt((getWidth() * getWidth()) + (getHeight() * getHeight()));
00045             if (Utils::get()->onScreen(tex, parent->getWorldPosition(), parent->getWorldScale() * radius))
00046             {
00047                 Camera* cam = tex->getCamera();
00048                 hgeVector screenPosition = cam->convertToScreenSpace(parent->getWorldPosition());
00049                 render(parent, screenPosition, cam);
00050             }
00051         }
00052     }
00053 }
